title: The Most Romantic Scent a Person Can Wear, According to Maddie Ziegler
description: Maddie Ziegler has never really been out of the spotlight. She made her reality television debut on "Dance Moms" as a 7-year-old in 2011, quickly becoming known as the star of the show (oftentimes to the dismay of her fellow young castmates). Her popularity grew when recording artist Sia tapped ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
